review_data.title: Good food and great espresso
review_data.content: I always visit La Piazzetta when in Zurich Just for a coffee or sometimes a meal. Relaxed atmosphere, good service, good Italian food and great coffee. I appreciate that they serve their menu even at that odd time in the afternoon between lunch and dinner.
